ai-tha-ap234:1.4_0: at the fore of the Community of monks
ai-tha-ap234:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap234:2.4_0: this is the fruit for the burden.
ai-tha-ap234:3.1_0: Having wisdom these many allowable things,
ai-tha-ap234:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhallika.
ai-tha-ap234:6.1_0: the second dispensation of the Elder Nun Bhaddā Kāpilānī
